byline.original: By ANNIE CORREAL and ANDY NEWMAN

abstract: Friday and the weekend: Stopping in the city on a human-powered journey, deteriorating weather, and don’t flush those wet wipes.

headline.main: New York Today: Global Trekker Rolls Into Town
